page.title: 08Public Transport in Sutton.
page.content: {Mr Bolton}who drives the buses at {Louth}has worked there for 2 years.At {Louth}they have 7 double deckers and no single deckers.They have 15 bus drives in the winter and 20 in the summer.{Mr Bolton}enjoys driving and speaking to people.All the drivers have to pass a special driving test{Mr {Bolton}passed his at Scotland Yard Test.He does not like shifts and bank holidays.He has not being done for speeding yet.{Mr Bolton's}passengers are mainly old age pensioners the wear on the tires is about Â£1:10p a mile the fare from Sutton to{Skegness}is Â£1:45p each way.The last bus leaves Sutton at 4:10.the fare for a child is 97p each way and Â£1:45p return.The first bus to leave Sutton is at 10:04. It arrives at{Skegness}at 10:59am.
